version_mismatch.zh: 当前版本 {current_version} < 要求的最低版本 {min_required_version}，请下载最新版本: {update_url}
version_mismatch.en: Current version {current_version} < required minimum version {min_required_version}, please download the latest version: {update_url}

title.zh: 此修复工具适用于WWMI生产的Mod因游戏版本更新导致失效的情况
title.en: This repair tool is applicable when the mods produced by WWMI become ineffective due to the update of the game version.

intro.zh:
修复2.6: 修复 男主 女主 珂莱塔 椿 今汐/皮肤 守岸人 折枝 长离 维里奈 白芷 卡卡罗 秋水 菲比 布兰特 坎特蕾拉 赞妮 夏空 卡提西娅 露帕 弗洛洛 的贴图问题

由于出现问题的角色过多，其他角色的修复请等待后续更新
intro.en:
Fix 2.6: Fix texture issues for MaleRover FemaleRover Carlotta Camellya Jinhsi/JinhsiPeachBlossom Shorekeeper Zhezhi Changli Virina Baizhi Calcharo Aalto Phoebe Brant Cantarella Zani Ciaccona Cartethyia Lupa Phrolova

Due to the large number of characters with issues, please wait for subsequent updates for fixes for other characters.

intro_note.zh: 修复【长离】【维里奈】【今汐皮肤】【白芷】【秧秧】时，建议将mod还原至未使用任何修复的状态或重新解压，再应用此修复
intro_note.en: When fixing [Changli] [Virina] [JinhsiPeachSkin] [Baizhi] [Yangyang], it is recommended to restore the mod to the state before any fixes or re-download/re-extract it, and then apply this fix tool.

compatibility_note.zh: 注：wwmi 0.6x版本的旧Mod在WWMI 070版本之后需开启兼容模式才能加载. 从WWMI076开始默认关闭了兼容模式. 开启方式: 游戏内 Alt + F12. 显示 Compatibility Mode: Enabled
compatibility_note.en: Note: The old mods of the WWMI 0.6x version need to have the compatibility mode enabled to be loaded after the WWMI 070 version. Starting from WWMI 076, the compatibility mode is turned off by default. The way to enable it is: press Alt + F12 in the game. It should display 'Compatibility Mode: Enabled'.

graphics_setting_note.zh: 游戏从2.0版本开始不同画面预设的Hash值可能不同，这可能导致Mod贴图错误，请将图形质量预设调整至均衡/画面优先
graphics_setting_note.en: Starting from version 2.0, different graphics presets may have different hash values, which may cause mod texture errors. Please set the graphics quality preset to Balanced/Quality.

texture_override_note.zh: 游戏2.1版本已经在设置添加了受伤表现开关，此工具仍提供战损修复功能，自行选择是否启用
texture_override_note.en: In game 2.1 version, 'Wounded Effect' has been added to the settings, this tool still provides injured texture hash fix, please choose whether to enable it.

found_old_mod.zh: 发现旧版Mod(wwmi 0.6x)，正在尝试修复...
found_old_mod.en: Found old mod (wwmi 0.6x), trying to fix...

texture_override_prompt.zh: 是否移除受伤表现？ （默认否）:

injured_hash_replace_note.en: Character {character} has injured texture hash {original_hash} -> section {section_header}

injured_hash_replace_warning.zh: 文件 {file_path} 中没有找到合适的位置插入战损修复节，请手动检查
injured_hash_replace_warning.en: No suitable position found for injured texture hash replacement in file {file_path}, please check manually

process_file_done.zh: 已完成对文件 {file_path} 的处理

no_need_fix.zh: 未匹配到修复，跳过备份与处理
no_need_fix.en: No need to fix, skip backup and processing

process_file_error.zh: 处理文件 {file_path} 时出现异常: {exception}

process_folder_done.zh: 共处理了 {success_count} 个文件，跳过 {failure_count} 个文件

input_folder_prompt.zh: 请输入包含Mod文件的文件夹路径（直接回车则从当前目录开始）:
input_folder_prompt.en: Please enter the folder path containing mod files (press Enter to use current directory):

start_processing.zh: 开始处理文件夹 {mod_folder_path} 下的Mod ini文件
start_processing.en: Start processing mod ini files in folder {mod_folder_path}

all_done.zh: 所有文件处理完成，按回车键关闭窗口...
all_done.en: All files processed, press Enter to exit...

error_prompt.zh: 程序出现异常，请查看上述错误信息，按任意键关闭窗口...
error_prompt.en: An error occurred. Please check the error message above and press any key to exit...

aero_rover_female_eyes_prompt.zh: 是否修复女漂-风主形态满共鸣能量时眼睛异常？确保你的mod存在此问题，否则不要开启! （默认否）:
aero_rover_female_eyes_prompt.en: Fix eyes of female aero-rover when it has full charge? Make sure your mod has the problem, otherwise don't enable it! (default no):

aero_rover_female_eyes_fixed.zh: 女漂-风主形态满共鸣能量时眼睛已修复
aero_rover_female_eyes_fixed.en: Female aero-rover eyes fixed when it has full charge
